item.title: Thousands suffer on Manikganj's dilapidated road
item.description: MANIKGANJ, Dec 31: Thousands of local residents have been suffering immensely as a vital rural road in Singair Upazila of Manikganj is in poor condition. Although over a year and a half has passed since the deadline to complete the road renovation project was over, works remain virtually inactive.
